PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Curious and dedicated Software Developer with hands-on experience in web development and migration projects. Specialized in React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS with advanced English proficiency. Passionate about delivering responsive, optimized user experiences and learning new technologies.
